titleStmt.title: A letter to the Earl of Shaftsbury this 9th of July, 1680 from Tom Tell-Troth, a downright Englishman.
titleStmt.author: Tel-Troth, Tom.
Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.

notesStmt.note: "... to lay before you the great mischiefs that both the monarchy and Protestant religion do suffer in respect of the present designs of papist and commonwealths-man ..."--P. 1.
Place and date of publication from BM.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
